text: ངག་དབང་བློ་གྲོས་གྲགས་པའི་་གསུང་འབུམ། Works of Ngawang Lodroe Dragpa 昂旺羅卓扎巴大師全集
zh-TW: 昂旺羅卓扎巴大師全集
zh-CN: 昂旺罗卓扎巴大师全集

nodes.en: Volume 1, ༼ཀ༽
dkar chag
bar chad mtha' dag gi dug nad sel ba'i 'chi med bdud rtsi zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
bar chad lam sel nyung bsdus/
kun mkhyen yab sras rje btsun bcas la mchod thabs rgyun khyer nyung bsdus byin rlabs sgo 'byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
kun mkhyen yab sras brgyud rim bcas kyi mchod thabs la sbyar 'os pa'i lhan thabs byin rlabs dpal ster zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
kun mkhyen yab sras brgyud par bcas la tshogs mchod 'bul thabs nyer bsdus chos rje dgyes pa'i mchod sprin bzhugs so/ /
kun mkhyen jo nang pa chen po'i bla ma rgyang 'bod nges don byin rlabs myur 'jug ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
kun mkhyen yab sras mchod chog lhan thabs kyi zur 'debs lag len nyer mkho zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
kun mkhyen yab sras mchod chog zur bkol nyer mkho bstan 'gror phan byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
kun mkhyen rton pa bzhi ldan gyi skyes rabs rnam thar tshigs bcad ma kun nyon tsha gdung 'phrog pa'i chos snang 'od dkar zla ba'i bsil zer zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
kun mkhyen yab sras brgyud rim bcas kyi mchod thabs la sbyar 'os pa'i lhan thabs byin rlabs dpal ster zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
kun mkhyen yab sras brgyud rim bcas kyi lhan thabs dang tshogs mchod sogs la mkho ba'i lag len gyi rim pa 'dod dgu 'jo ba'i bum bzang zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
kun mkhyen yab sras mchod chog lhan thabs kyi zur 'debs lag len nyer mkho zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
thun mong ma yin pa'i smon lam rgyal ba rgya mtsho bzhugs so//
rim gnyis zab mo'i lam gyi smon lam khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
Volume 2, ༼ཁ༽
dkar chag
dpal ldan jo nang pa'i chos 'byung rgyal ba'i chos tshul gsal byed zla ba'i sgron me zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /stod cha/

dpal ldan jo nang pa'i chos 'byung rgyal ba'i chos tshul gsal byed zla ba'i sgron me zhes bya ba'i gzhung gi kha skong lhan thabs brgyud rim dpal ldan bla ma gang dag gi mtshan nyid rab tu gsal ba nyi gzhon 'od snang dad pa'i padmo rnam par bzhad byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
Volume 3, ༼ག༽
dkar chag
Volume 4, ༼ང༽
dkar chag
dpal jo nang pa'i lugs kyi bka' brgyud zab mo'i gnas lugs nyams len gyi tshul mdo tsam bkod pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
dpal jo nang pa'i lugs kyi bka' brgyud zab mo'i gnas lugs nyams len gyi tshul mdo tsam bkod pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
las dang po pa dag gis rang lugs dus 'khor lhan skyes phyogs la bzlas sgom byed tshul zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
rdzogs rim yan lag drug gi bsdus don rab gsal nor bu'i me long zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
rton pa bzhi ldan gyis mdzad pa'i spring yig
rton pa bzhi ldan gyis mdzad pa'i spring yig chen mo'i tshig 'grel gsal byed mtshon tsam nges gsang sgo 'byed ces bya ba bzhugs so//
skar rtsis byed grub zung gi khungs las brtsams pa'i nyer mkho'i don nyung bsdus su brjod pa rigs ldan bla ma dgyes byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
thub bstan snga phyi dar tshul nyer mkho'i legs bshad kyi cha zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
tshe sgrub kyi bsdus dmigs zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
'jam dpal na ga raksha'i sgrub thabs kyi dmigs rim mdor bsdus gnyan rig kun 'joms zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
mnyam nyid mi g.yo ma'i bstod 'grel/
las dang po pa la nyer mkho'i rigs zhi lhag bsam gzugs sogs kyi rnam bshad nyung bsdus blo gsal yid kyi dga' ston zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
zab mo nges gsang gi lta ba'i rnam par bshad pa nyung bsdus nges gsang padmo 'byed pa'i nyi zer zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
chos nyams len gyi tshul lam gsum snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
nges don stong nyid bcu drug gi don bsdus/
bde ba can du skye ba'i rgyu tshogs sgrub tshul rnam dag zhing gi lam bzang zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
skyabs gsum gyi rnam bshad theg mchog nges pa'i myu gu zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
'jam mgon tā ra nā thas mdzad pa'i 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi bstod pa'i tshig 'grel zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
theg pa chen po'i blo sbyong mtshon cha'i 'khor lo bzhugs so/ /
blo sbyong mtshon cha'i 'khor lo'i 'bru 'grel gces 'dzin tsha gdung sel ba'i rab dkar zla gzhon zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
blo sbyong sgom tshul sems kyi dri ma sbyong byed bdud rtsi'i zil thigs zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
mthong don mchod brjod tshig 'grel nyung bsdus/
klong chen snying gi thig le'i thun mong phyi nang gi khrid yig mtshungs med bla ma dam pa'i zhal rgyun bzhugs/
Volume 5, ༼ཅ༽
dkar chag
phyi nang grub mtha'i rnam bzhag gi bsdus don blo gsal yid kyi rgyan bzang zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
thog mtha' bar du dge ba'i gtam bzang yang dag chos blo'i myu gu skyed byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
las dang po pa rnams la go sla'i ldog cha ngos 'dzin shes bya'i gnas tshul gsal byed/
bsdus grwa'i spyi don gyi snying po mdor bsdus su bkod pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
yin log min log gi zer tshul nyung bsdus/
mtshan mtshon dang rigs tshogs brjod pa'i rnam gzhag nyung bsdus/
bstan 'dzin skyes chen rim par byon pa'i lo rgyus mdor bsdus rin po che nor bu'i phreng ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
thog mar mang pos bkur ba'i rgyal po/
dge slong la nye bar mkho ba'i khrims kyi mi mthun phyogs nyung gsal du bkod pa rab gsal nor bu'i me long zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
dge tshul gyi bslab pa bsrung tshul bsdus pa khrims gtsang 'gugs pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
dge tshul rnams kyi gal che'i lag len/
sum cu pa'i sdom tshig
bsdus don gyi zur mchan/
mgyogs 'gro'i rta mchog gi bang rtsal 'gran tshul mdor bsdus gling rje ge sar dgyes pa'i mchod sprin zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
Volume 6, ༼ཆ༽
dkar chag
gu ru'i bla sgrub byin rlabs lhug par stsol ba'i thabs mchog ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
gu ru'i bla sgrub kyi zur lhan tshogs gnyis nyer skrun zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
gu ru'i bstod pa dge legs 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
gu ru'i bla sgrub dang 'brel ba'i tshe g.yang sgrub cing tshogs mchod byed pa'i tshul nyer mkho 'gro phan spel byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
gu ru rin po che'i sgo nas 'pho ba bya tshul zhing mchog sgo 'byed ces bya ba/
slob dpon rdo rje sku brnyes pad 'byung gi rnam par thar ba thun mong dang mthun pa bka' ma yongs grags rab gsal snang ba rdo rje'i me long zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
gu ru mtsho skyes rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa thun min dag snang rgyan gyi 'khor lo las cha tsam mngon par brjod pa bde chen rdo rje gzi 'bar zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
rje tā ra nā tha'i sku 'das pa'i tshul gyi rnam par thar ba 'jam mgon dgyes pa'i kun bzang mchod sprin zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
dpal ldan bla ma skyabs mgon ngag dbang mtshan bzang dpal gyi sde'i rnam par thar pa dad pa'i padmo mngon par bzhad byed nyi gzhon gsar ba'i 'od bzang zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
gsang sngags kyi rdo rje slob dpon chen po kun dga' snyan grags rgya mtsho'i rtogs brjod kyi rnam thar dpal ldan bla ma dgyes pa'i kun bzang mchod sprin zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
dpal ldan bla ma ngag dbang bstan pa rab rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa mdo tsam bkod pa dad pa'i myu gu 'phel byed ces bya ba bzhugs so//
dpal ldan bla ma ngag dbang dpal bzang po'i rnam par thar pa rdo rje'i slob ma'i dag snang sbyong byed ces bya ba bzhugs so//
Volume 7, ༼ཇ༽
dkar chag
rje btsun sgrol ma'i sgo nas bar chad lam sel 'dod don legs stsol zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
rje btsun sgrol ma'i sgo nas bla ma spyi la sbyar rung gi sgrub thabs gsol bsnyen bya tshul nyer mkho bzhugs/
nges don kun khyab dag snang sgrol ma'i chos skor chog sgrig sgrib pa sbyang zhing bsod nams bsags pa'i thabs grub gnyis dpal ster zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
sgrol ma nyer gcig phyogs mthun nyer bsdus kyi sgrub thabs bzhugs so/ /
sgrol ljang gtso mo'i bdag bskyed bzhugs so/ /
lha mo nyer gcig gi bstod gsol phrin las myur 'jug bzhugs so/ /
gtso mo'i sgos bstod gtang rag dga' ston bzhugs so/ /
'phags ma la bkra shis rtags brgyad kyi 'dod gsol nyer bsdus phrin las myur 'jug ces bya ba so/ /
mdo sngags yongs rdzogs dang 'brel ba'i 'phags ma la gdung 'bod kyi tshul gyis 'dod gsol lam zab legs 'jo zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
sgrol ma'i gsol smon bstan 'gro'i legs phan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
gdung 'bod thugs rje 'gugs pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
'phags ma la re skyabs snying nas byed pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
'phags ma la re zhu rkyen ngan kun gzhom zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
gsol 'debs gdung 'bod nyer bsdus sogs bzhugs so/ /
rje btsun sgrol ma'i sgo nas sgrib sbyong byed pa'i thabs nyes sel legs 'byor bzhugs so/ /
sgrol ma'i bklag chog chos bcud nyer stsol zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
sgrol ma'i bklag chog sogs bzhugs/
sgrol ma'i sngags don/
sgrol ma'i gtor bsngo bsdus pa dang bskang bsdus bzhugs/
sgrol ma dkar dmar gyi bskang bsdus bzhugs so/ /
sgrol ma'i 'pho ba bzhugs/
nges don dang 'brel ba'i rje btsun ma gtso 'khor la maṇḍal bzhi yi sgo nas mchod pa 'bul ba'i thabs grub gnyis myur stsol zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
rje btsun sgrol ma'i sgo nas g.yang 'gugs kyi sgrub thabs mdor bsdus zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
'gong bkar bsdus pa bzhugs/
rje btsun 'phags ma la bstod pa'i sgo nas g.yang 'bod dngos grub myur 'gugs zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
sgrol ma'i g.yang 'gugs 'jig rten nyer mkho lag sbyin zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
rje btsun sgrol ma la brten nas chos dang mthun pa'i g.yang 'gugs thabs 'phags ma'i thugs rje'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
rje btsun sgrol ma la brten nas 'jig rten dang mthun pa'i g.yang 'gugs thabs 'dod pa myur 'byin zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
sgrol ma'i g.yang 'gugs nyung bsdus bzhugs so/ /
rje btsun sgrol ma'i sgo nas g.yang 'bod bsdus pa gang 'dod 'jo ba'i bum bzang zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
sgrol ma'i g.yang 'gugs nyer mkho bsdus pa bzhugs/
bla med lugs kyi sgrol tshogs bzhugs/
sgrol ma'i tshogs bsdus sogs bzhugs/
dga' ston tshogs kyi glu rang byung lhan skyes 'char byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
gnas lugs dang 'brel ba'i bsngags gsol gyi glu bzhad 'phags ma'i dgyes mchod ces bya ba bzhugs so / /
deng dus dang mthun pa'i smon tshig bsam pa myur 'grub ces bya ba bzhugs/
g.yu lo bkod pa'i zhing gi smon lam bsdus pa bzhugs/
nges don dang 'brel ba'i g.yu lo bkod pa'i zhing gi smon lam 'phags ma'i bden don zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

nges pa don gyi bla ma dang yi dam lha mo gang dag gdod ma nas dbyer med rtag brtan spros bral 'od gsal rnam kun tu bzhugs pa nyid 'gro kun la mngon pa'i smon lam don dam bde chen rdo rje 'bar ba'i gzi brgya zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
sgrol ma'i smon lam gang smon legs 'grub dang gdung 'bod bzhugs/
rje btsun sgrol ma nyer gcig gi bkra shis dge legs myur stsol zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
snyan ngag me long gi spyi bsdus 'phags ma sgrol ma la bsngags tshig gi mchod pa mdzes sdug utpal phreng ba'i chun po rgyal yum dgyes bskyed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
'od zer can ma'i gsol 'debs/
sgrol ma'i mig gi 'khor lo'i thabs bzhugs/
rje btsun sgrol ma dmar mo'i sgo nas maṇḍal bzhi pa'i mchod pa byed pa'i thabs tshul nyung ngur bkod pa byin rlabs 'dod pa 'jo ba'i bum bzang zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
dbang gi lha mo'i las tshogs sgrub tshul snying po tsam bkod pa grub 'bras myur 'byin zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
dbang gi lha mo'i sgo nas nor sgrub sogs bzhugs/
sgrol ma'i sgo nas bum gter sgrub 'jog gi thabs phun tshogs nyer stsol zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
sgrol ma'i dmigs rim bsdus pa bzhugs/
sgrol ma'i bsang 'bod nyung ngu sogs bzhugs/
'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgo nas rno mthong gsal ba'i thabs bzhugs/
sgrol ma'i mo yig rno mthong gsal ba'i nyer mkho'i lhan thabs bzhugs/
'jigs pa chen po brgyad dang bcu drug las bskyabs pa'i gtam rgyud kyi brjed byang bzhugs/
gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma lha dgu'i sgrub chog mchod rten bum pa la gtsor brten stong mchod kyi cho ga bum sgrub dbang chog gi lag len 'gro phan spel byed rab gsal bzhugs so/ /
rnam rgyal lha dgu'i brgyud 'debs byin rlabs myur 'jug ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma lha dgu'i sgrub chog mchod rten bum pa la gtsor brten stong mchod kyi cho ga'i lag len rab gsal bzhugs so/ /
rnal 'byor rgyud dang bya rgyud yan la thun mong du sbyar rung cha gsum gyi gtor chog mdor bsdus zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
rje btsun tā ra nā thas mdzad pa'i rnam rgyal bum sgrub kyi dbang chog 'gro phan spel byed bzhugs so/ /
'phags ma gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i lho sgo bzhugs/
lho sgo'i bshags pa'i skabs kyi ngo sprod bzhugs/
'phags ma gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i 'pho ba'i mgor mtshan dang gsol 'debs bya tshul bzhugs/
'phags ma gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i 'pho ba dbyings rig bsre byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
'phags ma gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i smon lam gyi tshig 'dod don legs 'grub ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
'phags ma gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i shis brjod phan bde kun stsol zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
rnam rgyal lha dgu'i dbang gi mtshams sbyar dbang don gsal byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
bkra shis rdzas brgyad kyi lo rgyus kyi go don dang bcas pa bzhugs/
rnam rgyal ma'i dbang gi mtshams sbyar bsdus pa bzhugs/
'phags ma gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i rig sngags la brten nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya ba'i tshul gyi cho ga bstan 'gro'i phan bde spel byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
rgyud sde lnga'i sbyin sreg gi las 'grig nyung bsdus bzhugs/
gtso 'dus brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs dngos grub char 'bebs bzhugs so/ /
rgyud sde lnga'i lha lnga gtso bor bsdus pa'i man ngag bla ma gong ma'i phyag len bzhugs so/ /
rgyud sde lnga gtso bsdus la brten pa'i dkyil 'khor mchod chog bdag dang bcas pa smin grol snying po zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
gtso 'dus kyi sgo nas tshogs mchod bya thabs bzhugs/
dpal rgyud sde lnga'i gtso bsdus kyis sgo nas gshin po rjes 'dzin thar par bgrod pa'i them skas bzhugs so/ /
gtso 'dus kyi sgo nas lho  sgo'i cho ga mtshon tsam bya tshul bzhugs so/ /
Volume 8, ༼ཉ༽
dkar chag
sdom gsum rim par nod pa gang dag la lag len nyer mkho'i rim pa gal chen phyogs gcig tu bsgrigs pa bslab khrims dri ma 'khrud pa'i dag byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
ston pa bcom ldan 'das la mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi sgo nas bstod pa bzhugs/
cho 'phrul gyi bstod pa bzhugs/
bsnyen rdzogs mkhan brgyud gsol 'debs kha skong dang bcas pa bzhugs/
gnas brtan chen po bcu drug gi phyag mchod ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
las dang po pa'i rim pa phan bde'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
mchog gsum spyi la mchod pa 'bul ba'i thabs tshul rgyal ba dgyes pa'i mchod sprin zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
mdo sngags mchod pa'i kha skong shel dkar phreng ba bde stong skrun byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
mchod chog nyer bsgrigs nyung bsdus su legs par bkod pa tshogs gnyis legs bskrun zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
spyi bshags nyes ltung gdung ba sel ba'i zla zer sogs bzhugs/
'phags pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i gzungs bzhugs so/ /
mchod pa'i sprin gzungs sogs bzhugs/
sdom gsum smon bsdus legs don yongs 'grub bzhugs/
byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa las/ bsngo ba'i le'u zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
mdo sngags smon lam gser gyi phreng ba bla ma dgyes pa'i mchod pa'i sprin chen zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
kha phud 'bul sogs bzhugs/
'dir sdom lung sbyin thabs mdor bsdus bzhugs/
sdom pa sbyin thabs mdor bsdus bzhugs/
sdom lung zab mo sbyin pa'i yi ge skal ldan thar lam bgrod byed bzhugs/
dge bsnyen sdom pa sbyin thabs bzhugs/
'dir sdom lung sbyin thabs mdor bsdus bzhugs/
dge tshul slo nga gis rgyun khye ra bsnyung gnas kyi gso sbyong ji ltar len tshul spros med bzhugs/
bsnyen gnas gso sbyong sbyin thabs gzhan phan nyi ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
gso sbyong sbyin thabs mdor bsdus bzhugs/
gcig sdom len tshul bzhugs/
zab lam 'pho ba'i man ngag nyams su len tshul phyogs bsdus su nye bar bkod pa thar ba'i sgo 'byed ces bya ba sogs bzhugs/
jo nang sbyor drug bla brgyud dang bla chen gzhan gang byon chos 'byung ltar la phyag dang gsol 'debs skyabs 'gro byed tshul kha skong dang bcas pa bzhugs so/ /
'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
'pho ba'i nyer mkho bsdus pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
zab lam 'pho ba'i man ngag nyams su len tshul phyogs bsdus su nye bar bkod pa thar ba'i sgo 'byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
'pho ba'i lhan thabs nges don khyad 'phags kyi lag len 'gro phan legs spel zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
dmigs bcas dmigs med kyi 'pho ba bzhugs/
gu ru rin po che'i sgo nas 'pho ba bya tshul zhing mchog sgo 'byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
mkha' spyod ma'i 'pho ba dbyings rig bsre byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
sgrol ma'i 'pho ba bzhugs/
rnam rgyal ma'i 'pho ba dbyings rig bsre byed ces bya ba bzhugs/
'pho ba bsdus pa'i skor bzhugs/
nges pa don gyi bla ma dang yi dam lha mo gang dag gdod nas dbyer med du bzhugs pa 'gro kun la mngon pa'i smon lam don dam bde chen rdo rje 'bar ba'i gzi brgya zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
deng dus dang mthun pa'i smon tshig bsam pa myur 'grub ces bya ba bzhugs/
g.yu lo bkod pa'i zhing gi smon lam bsdus pa bzhugs/
nges don dang 'brel ba'i g.yu lo bkod pa'i zhing gi smon lam 'phags ma'i bden don zhes bya ba  bzhugs/

nges pa don gyi bla ma dang yi dam lha mo gang dag gdod ma nas dbyer med rtag brtan spros bral 'od gsal rnam kun tu bzhugs pa nyid 'gro kun la mngon pa'i smon lam don dam bde chen rdo rje 'bar ba'i gzi brgya zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
sgrol ma'i smon lam gang smon legs 'grub dang gdung 'bod bzhugs/
'phags ma gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i smon lam gyi tshig 'dod don legs 'grub ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
mngon dga'i zhing smon nyer bsdus/
bsngo smon bsdus pa bzhugs/
nges don rdzogs ldan gyi bstan pa rab tu rgyas pa'i smon tshig bzhugs/
shambha la'i bstod smon zhing mchog sgo 'byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
shambha la'i smon tshig bzhugs/
shambha la'i smon lam bden tshig myur 'grub ces bya ba bzhugs/
shambha la'i legs smon bsam don myur 'grub bzhugs/
smon tshig rnam dag gi myu gu bzhugs/
dge bsngo  nges don dang 'brel ba bzhugs/
smon tshig nges don lhun grub ces bya ba bzhugs/
lhag pa'i lha rnam gnyis la brten nas thos bsam gyi 'dod smon bzhugs/
bde smon nyung bsdus gang smon myur 'grub bzhugs/
bsngo  smon don kun myur 'grub sogs bzhugs/
smon tshig 'dod don legs 'grub bzhugs/
bsngo smon bsam don myur 'grub ces bya ba bzhugs/
smon lam dge legs mchog stsol zhes bya bzhugs/
mtshan brjod smon tshig zab don mngon byed ces bya ba bzhugs/
'phags pa bskal pa bzang po pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo las dbu mtha' dang mtshan spungs khol du phyung ba bzhugs so/ /
rgyal ba rigs lnga'i zhing gi smon lam bzhugs/
dpal mchog dang po'i sangs rgyas dus kyi 'khor lo'i rten dang brten par bcas pa'i smon tshig 'khor 'das cig char gsal ba'i bde chen ye shes skrun byed shel gyi me long zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
Volume 9, ༼ཏ༽
dkar chag
dpal ldan bla ma la mchod pa phul ba'i phan yon/
sbyor drug brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs byin rlabs 'pho byed ces bya ba bzhugs so//
bla ma brgyud pa'i gsol 'debs byin rlabs 'dod pa 'jo ba'i bum bzang zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
bla ma'i don dam chos sku la mnyam par 'jog thabs byin rlabs myur nas 'bebs byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
bla ma rnams kyi rnal 'byor nyams su len tshul sgrib sbyangs tshogs chen rdzogs thabs bzhugs so/ /
bla ma rnam gsum gyi rnal 'byor dang 'brel ba'i rgyang 'bod bcas kyi lag len nyams bzang myu gu bskrun byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
rtsa ba'i bla ma rdor sems dbyer med kyi sgom bzlas byed thabs bsdus pa sogs rdor sems sgom bzlas kyi skor bzhugs so/ /
bla sgrub bsdus pa bzhugs/
rtsa ba'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor nyer bsdus/
rtsa ba'i bla ma rdor sems dang dus 'khor dbyer med kyi sgom bzlas sogs bzhugs so/ /
rtsa ba'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor bsdus pa bzhugs/
bla ma rin chen bzang po'i gsol 'debs byang chub lam bzang stsol pa'i bum bzang zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
khyab bdag bla ma smon lam bzang po'i rgyang 'bod byin rlabs myur nas 'bebs byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
rtsa ba'i bla ma kun dga' ngag gi dbang po'i byin rlabs 'bebs byed kyi rnal 'byor bla ma'i dgongs chen mjal byed dang gsol 'debs sogs bzhugs so/ /
rtsa ba'i bla ma ngag dbang bstan pa gsal byed gang gi bla ma'i rnal 'byor byin rlabs myur stsol zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
rdo rje bzang po'i bla sgrub byin rlabs legs stsol zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
rdo rje bzang po'i bla rnam byin rlabs myur 'gugs zhes bya ba bzhugs/
rdo rje bzang po'i bla ma rgyang 'bod byin rlabs sgo 'byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
ngag dbang rdo rje bzang po'i bla ma rgyang 'bod bsdus pa bzhugs/
bla ma rdo rje bzang po'i gsol 'debs bzhugs/
bla ma rgyang 'bod bsdus pa gsang sngags dga' ston ster byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
rdo rje 'chang ngag dbang dkon mchog dar rgyas kyi bla ma'i rnal 'byor bya thabs mdor bsdus su bkod pa byin rlabs sgo 'byed ces bya ba bzhugs so//
ngag dbang dkon mchog dar rgyas kyi bla rnam rdor sems sgom bzlas bzhugs/
rdo rje 'chang ngag dbang dkon mchog dar rgyas kyi bla ma rgyang 'bod dang gsol 'debs sogs kyi skor bzhugs so/ /
rdo rje 'chang ngag dbang dkon mchog dar rgyas la gsol 'debs dgos don lhun grub ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
bla ma rgyang 'bod byin rlabs myur 'bebs zhes bya ba bzhugs/
ngag dbang blo gros grags pa'i skye phreng gsol 'debs bzhugs/
bla ma rin po che ngag dbang blo gros grags pa'i skye phreng gsol 'debs nor bu ke ta ka'i phreng ba yid gnyis kyi rnyog ma gsal byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
bla ma ngag dbang blo gros grags pa'i gsol 'debs byin rlabs myur 'bebs dang gsol 'debs sogs kyi skor bzhugs so/ /
rdo rje 'chang ngag dbang blo gros grags pa'i zhabs kyi bla ma'i rnal 'byor byin rlabs 'gugs pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba bzhugs so//
gdung dbyangs kyi bla ma rgyang 'bod sogs bzhugs/
lha rtse'i dge slong blo gros rgya mtsho'i bla rnam nyer bsdus byin rlabs sgo 'byed dang bla ma rgyang 'bod gsol 'debs sogs bzhugs so/ /
lha rtse'i dge slong blo gros rgya mtsho'i bla ma rgyang 'bod/
lha rtse'i dge slong blo gros rgya mtsho'i gsol 'debs/

bla ma rdo rje 'chang skyabs rje zla ba grags pa khong la brten nas mos gus dag snang gi sgo nas don dam pa'i sangs rgyas dngos dang dbyer med kyi dag mnyam zab mos byin rlabs 'bebs thabs grub gnyis myur stsol zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
rje btsun dpal ldan bla ma dam pa ngag dbang rin chen bzang po'i bla ma rgyang 'bod byin rlabs myur 'bebs zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
bla ma rin chen bzang po'i bla rnam mdor bsdus bzhugs/
bla ma rnam gsum gyi gsol 'debs dang 'brel ba'i bsod nams bsags thabs bzhugs/
bla ma rin chen bzang po'i gsol 'debs skor bzhugs/
bla ma rin chen bzang po'i bla rnam mdor bsdus zhes bya ba bzhugs/
bla ma rin chen bzang po'i gdung 'bod bzhugs/
'jam mgon bla ma mchog gi bla ma'i rnal 'byor bya thabs gsang chen nyams myong skrun byed gru char zhes bya bzhugs/
khyab bdag dpal ldan bla ma dkon mchog bstan pa'i nyi ma zhes bya ba gang gi bla sgrub bsdus pa byin rlabs myur 'gugs zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
dkon mchog gsang ba mtha' yas kyi bla ma'i rnal 'byor byin rlabs sgo 'byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
dkon mchog gsang ba mtha' yas kyi rgyang 'bod bzhugs/
bla ma'i rnal 'byor mdor bsdus bya ba'i tshul byin rlabs sgo 'byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
skyabs rje kun dga' rgya mtsho'i bla sgrub byin rlabs myur 'bebs dang gsol 'debs bzhugs/
skyabs rje kun dga' rgya mtsho'i skye phreng gsol 'debs bzhugs/
bla ma rin chen dar rgyas kyi bla sgrub zab mo byin rlabs 'bebs pa'i thabs mchog dang gsol 'debs bzhugs/
bla ma ngag dpal gyi bla ma'i rnal 'byor mdor bsdus bzhugs/
bla ma'i rnal 'byor dang 'brel ba'i sgom sgrub byed thabs byin rlabs mchog stsol zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
rdo rje 'chang sa dmar bla ma ngag dpal gyi bla ma rgyang 'bod dang gsol 'debs sogs bzhugs/
bla ma rang gsal gyi bla rnam mdor bsdus bzhugs/
bla ma rang gsal gyi rgyang 'bod byin rlabs myur 'bebs dang gsol 'debs sogs bzhugs/
ngag dbang bsod nams bzang po nyer mkho bla ma rgyang 'bod bzhugs/
rtsa ba'i bla ma dang dbyer med pa rdor sems sgom bzlas kyi thabs mdor bsdus bzhugs/
dbon bsod nams rgya mtsho dang mchog sprul kun dga' rnam gnyis kyi bla sgrub bzhugs/
dbon bsod nams rgya mtsho bla ma rgyang 'bod bsdus pa dad pa bskyed pa'i dga' ston zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
mchog sprul kun dga' dpal gyi rgyang 'bod mdor bsdus byin rlabs dpal stsol zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
mchog sprul kun dga' dpal gyi sprul sku myur byon smon tshig legs bsdus 'dod pa myur 'grub dang gsol 'debs sogs bzhugs/
bstan pa rab rgyas kyi rgyang 'bod bzhugs/
ngag dbang gsal bzang gi bla sgrub nyung bsdus byin rlabs 'bebs byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
bla ma ngag dbang gsal bzang gi rgyang 'bod rgyas bsdus gnyis bzhugs/
bla ma mtshan ldan gyi rnal 'byor byin rlabs 'od brgya'i snang ba stsol ba'i nyin byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
bla ma bstan 'dzin dpal bzang gi gdung 'bod bzhugs/
rnal 'byor mchog nye bar mnga' ba'i gsang sngags rdo rje 'dzin pa karma nor bu gang nyid kyi bla sgrub gsang ba zab mo'i sgo 'byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
bla ma phun tshogs kyi rgyang 'bod dang gsol 'debs bzhugs/
gsol 'debs dang zhabs brtan smon tshig sogs thor bu'i skor bzhugs/
smon tshig 'dod don legs 'grub bzhugs/
rdor sems he ru ka'i bsnyen chog bstan 'gror phan byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa'i bskyed bsdus bzhugs/
rdo rje sems dpa' la tshogs mchod 'bul thabs dga' chen ston mo zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
bla rnam dang 'brel ba'i tshogs mchod 'jam mgon bla ma dgyes byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
'od dpag med kyi bklag chog bsdus pa bzhugs/
zab mo gcod kyi zil gnon dang lus sbyin nges don rab gsal bzhugs/
kun mkhyen 'jam dbyangs bzhad pa'i gsol 'debs kyi tshig 'grel mdor bsdus bzhugs/
chos bshad ngo sprod bzhugs/
'phags mchog thugs rje chen po'i bdag bskyed dang mdun bskyed bstod pa'i skabs rnams kyi dmigs bzhugs/
sangs rgyas kyi mtshan 'don skabs kyi dmigs sogs bzhugs/
smon lam khyad par can gdab tshul/
khro ba 'gog byed kyi thabs tshul gdug sems gdung ba 'phrog pa'i bdud rtsi'i zegs ma zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
sems dad gus kyi blo 'dren gyi mgur glu ku hu'i mgrin dbyangs zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
dkon mchog gsum rjes su dran pa'i gdung 'bod dang bla ma gdung 'bod bzhugs/
zhal gdams bzhugs/
lugs srol so so'i lta ba'i ming tsam bzhugs/
'od gsal sems kyi de nyid sgom tshul dam pa'i man ngag ces bya ba bzhugs/
lta ba'i nyams mgur nang rig 'gyur med kyi yin lugs gsal byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
sprin gyi gtam bzang rna ba'i bcud len zhes bya ba lags/
padmo'i tshal la dgyes ldan bung ba'i tshogs rnams mgron du 'bod pa'i glu dbyangs dri za'i rgyud mangs zhes bya ba bzhugs/
yid sems chos la skul byed kyi gtam bzhugs/
mi rtag ston pa'i gtam bzhugs/
sems kyi chos nyid bzhugs/
yang dag chos las brtsams pa'i gtam bzang rna ba'i bcud len zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
sems ngo bsten tshul sogs zhal gdams thor bu'i skor bzhugs/
mi rtag rgyud bskul zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
rang gi nyin rer dge sbyor gang byed kyi thog mthar 'don sgom sgrags ma bya tshul bzhugs/
tshe dpag med lha dgu'i shis brjod ye shes snang ba'i rgyan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
rgyal ba mi 'khrugs pa'i shis brjod legs tshogs gru char 'jo ba'i chu 'dzin zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
bgegs bskrad bsdus pa dang rab gnas mdor bsdus bzhugs/
tshe thar gtong thabs bsdus pa bzhugs/
mar me'i smon lam bzhugs/
yon chab 'bul ba bzhugs/
'jam dpal nā ga raksha'i bum bsgrub sbyin sreg nyung bsdus spros med rgyun khyer gyi man ngag bzhugs so/ /
sher snying srung bzlog bsad dmigs gnad bsdus bzhugs/
sher mdo bklag tshul nyung bsdus su bkod pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
gdugs dkar gzungs mdo'i bklag chog mdor bsdus su bkod pa don mchog myur ldan zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
gsang bdag 'byung po 'dul byed gyi bsnyen bzlas bya ba'i thabs bsdus dngos grub nyer stsol bzhugs so/ /
dpal gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje 'byung po 'dul byed kyi bdag bskyed nyer mkho bsdus pa bzhugs/
man ngag las byung bla med dang 'brel ba'i gsang bdag 'byung po 'dul byed bskang ba grub gnyis myur 'byin zhes bya ba bzhugs/
phyag rdor gos sngon can gyi bskang bsdus grub gnyis 'dod 'jo zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

mgon po phyag drug pa'i bskang bsdus bzhugs/
mgon po drakshad kyi bskang bsdus sogs bzhugs/
nges don phur ba'i lus dkyil mdor bsdus dgongs chen bcud bsdus zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
phur ba'i bdag bskyed bsdus pa bzhugs/
rdo rje gzhon nu'i gsol bsdus bzhugs/

rnam rgyal ma'i bdag bskyed mdor bsdus bzhugs/

che mchog bskyed bzlas bzhugs/

lha mo sngags srung ma'i gsol bsdus 'dod don myur ster sogs kyi skor bzhugs/
za byed mkha' 'gro'i bsreg blugs bsdus pa bzhugs/
thar mdo'i bklag chog nyung bsdus zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
phung po gsum pa'i mdo'i bklag chog 'gro phan snang ba zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
lhag pa'i lha rnams la bstod tshig bsdus pa dad pa'i chu skyes dgyes pa'i ge sar zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
'dir 'jam dpal sgrub thabs mdor bsdus bzhugs/
'jam dbyangs kyi gsang gsum la bstod pa'i rab byed nges don sku gsum rang gsal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi bstod pa bzhugs/
rje btsun 'jam pa'i dbyangs la bstod pa'i rab byed 'jam mgon dgyes bskyed kun bzang mchod sprin zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
'phags ma lha mo dbyangs can la bstod pa'i rab byed rig gsang dpal ster zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
'jam dpal gzungs bstod blo gros myur stsol zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
dbyangs can lha mo gang la bstod sogs bya thabs smra ba'i sgo 'byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
dus 'khor gyi sgo nas bsreg chog sogs la brten te 'gro phan byed tshul spros med nyung bsdus su bkod pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /

nag po chen po'i sgo nas dgra mnan bya tshul bsdus pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
gsur mchod bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
dpal sprul rin po che'i gsur mchod chen mo'i cha lag kha skong lhan thabs 'gro phan spel byed ces bya ba bzhugs so//

chu gtor nyer bsdus bzhugs/
dzam lha ser nag zung dang dzam dkar chab gtor bsdus pa bzhugs/
'dir dag zhing yid byed kyi sgo nas 'od dpag med kyi mtshan don sgom bzlas zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
bla ma dang dbyer med pa'i 'od dpag med la brten nas mtshan sngags bzla tshul don gnyis myur 'grub ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /

las mgon zangs gri can gyi mnga' gsol nyer bsdus bzhugs/

sngon 'gro'i ngag 'don bsdus pa mkha' spyod bgrod byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /

rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku gsung thugs la bstod pa nyung bsdus zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
kun rig bskyed bzlas logs su gsal bkod bzhugs/
tsha sgrub skabs kyi kha bsgyur bzhugs/
mi 'khrugs pa'i sku chog dang sku sgrub kyi kha bsgyur lag len bzhugs/
bsnyung gnas rgyun gyi nyams len bya tshul mdor bsdus sgrib sbyong nges gsang legs 'byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
sa dmar dpal rtse dgon ji ltar btab pa'i lo rgyus mdo tsam brjod bzhugs/
gtor chog ches bsdus kyi lag len yang snying rgyun khyer du byed bde chos skyong dgyes bskyed ces bya ba bzhugs so//

rma chen spom ra'i gsol bsdus lha chen dgyes pa skong byed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
bag yag mtsho'i bsang mchod bzhugs/
gling rje ge sar 'khor bcas la gsol mchod mdor bsdus bzhugs/
seng chen rgyal po'i gsol mchod bsdus pa dgra bla dgyes skyed ces bya ba bzhugs so/ /
lha chen dar 'dzin gyi gsol mchod nyung bsdus bzhugs/
gsol mchod byed thabs legs bsdus rgyun khyer 'dod pa myur 'byin zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
ja mchod dge legs kun stsol bzhugs/
rgyal chen sku lnga'i gsol bsdus sogs kyi skor bzhugs/
dben gnas dar rnga'i gnas bdag lha chen rdo rje drag rtsal gnyan po'i bsang mchod 'dod dgu'i dpal ster zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
gtad sprug gi dkyil 'khor thig tshon rab gsal me long bzhugs/

ngo sprod dang rtsa bskyed skor bzhugs/

skabs su bab pa'i lugs gnyis kyi bslab bya'i zhal ta 'ga' sogs bzhugs/

par byang smon tshig gi skor bzhugs/
Volume 10, ༼ཐ༽
dkar chag
rgyu 'bras gnas lugs zab don rnam nges kyi nyer mkho sa bcad mtshan mtshon gzhi gsum zur gsal zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
rgyu dang 'bras bu'i theg pa mchog gi gnas lugs zab mo'i don rnam par nges pa rje jo nang pa chen po'i ring lugs 'jigs med gdong lnga'i nga ro zhes bya ba bzhugs so/ /
